sentences.en: It became possible to have a cafe because the building has been extended, and we've now got a new office and storeroom area.
sentences.cn: 由于大楼已经扩建，我们有可能拥有一间咖啡厅，而且现在我们有了新的办公室和储藏室。

sentences.en: They decided to turn their shelter into a storeroom.
sentences.cn: 他们决定把防空洞改造成储藏室。

sentences.en: She carted the rest to the English department storeroom.
sentences.cn: 其他的全部送给了英文系图书室。
